MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L21  postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Hapsford Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:31am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:38pm on 14th January 2021.
